p: The various non-volatile, volatile, flavonoids, phenolic acids, coumarin derivatives, monoterpene, and sesquiterpene constituents of Artemisia species were informed (Wallaart et al. 1999; Aberham et al. 2010; Khan et al. 2016; Ahuja et al. 2018; Nigam et al. 2019) given in the Fig. 1 compound 1– 16, Fig. 2 compound 17–31, and Fig. 3 compound 32–87 respectively.
